en.today: The moon takes her final steps through your sign, sweet ram, forming supportive connections with Chiron and Jupiter. Use your voice to find healing and expand upon existing ideas. A helpful alliance between the sun and Pluto brings perspective shifts, and you'll gain much when you seek to learn from peers and expand your worldview. Put away your screens to slow down with nature once Luna enters Taurus and squares Pluto. Surprises are in store when you stay present, thanks to a union between Mercury and Uranus. Your resolve increases once Saturn enters your sign tonight, inspiring you to go further than ever before.

en.today: Seek healing connections and spiritually charged environments early this morning, dearest Leo, as the Aries moon connects with Chiron and Jupiter. Meanwhile, the sun and Pluto align, intensifying relationships that are meant to stand the test of time. Learn from loved ones and choose partners you can evolve alongside. Get serious about your long-term goals, but leave room for additional insights when Luna enters Taurus and squares Pluto. Intellectual breakthroughs reveal solutions to your problems while Mercury and Uranus unite, marking the ideal time to brainstorm on these issues. Get ready to back up your wishes with hard work once Saturn enters Aries tonight.

en.today: Realistic dreams could reveal messages from beyond, dear Taurus when the Aries moon connects with Chiron and Jupiter early this morning. Meanwhile, the Gemini sun and Pluto align, making it easier to identify opportunities in the present moment. You'll feel ready to back up your dreams with action once Luna enters your sign, helping you get more comfortable in the public eye. Unfortunately, a harsh connection with Pluto could trigger some opposition. Luckily, Mercury and Uranus unite in your sign to unlock new levels of brilliance, helping you outsmart these challenges. Do more planning from behind the scenes once Saturn enters Aries tonight.

en.today: A buzzy energy permeates the air, dear Gemini, as the Aries moon connects with Chiron and Jupiter. You'll feel like strengthening your connections, but you should only partake in healthy conversations. Your ancestors rally to support your dreams while the sun and Pluto align, marking the perfect time to honor those who have crossed over while asking for additional guidance. Quiet down to receive enlightenment once the moon enters Taurus and aspects Pluto, and consider spending some alone time outside. Journaling or brainstorming will also serve you while Mercury and Uranus unite. Get ready to climb the social ladder once Saturn enters Aries tonight.
